named-query.name: Aggregate.SaldoDaContaNoDia
named-query.query:
SELECT l.conta.id, l.conta.nome, SUM(l.valor)
FROM Lancamento l WHERE
l.conta = :conta AND l.fato.dia <=:dia
GROUP BY l.conta.id, l.conta.nome

named-query.name: Conta.temLancamento
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(l.id) > 0 FROM Lancamento l WHERE l.conta = :conta

named-query.name: Conta.nomeEmUso
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(c.id) > 0 FROM Conta c WHERE c.nome = :nome
